original_text: But I tell you of a truth, many widows were in Israel in the days of Elias, when the heaven was shut up three years and six months, when great famine was throughout all the land;
korean_text: 내가 참으로 너희에게 이르노니 엘리야 시대에 하늘이 삼 년 육 개월간 닫히어 온 땅에 큰 흉년이 들었을 때에 이스라엘에 많은 과부가 있었으되

sentences.original_text: But I tell you of a truth
when the heaven was shut up
when great famine was throughout all the land
sentences.korean_translation: 큰 기근이 온 땅에 있을 때라
